Description:
"Great investment opportunity"
This 3 bedroom home is situated right in the heart of Corio. Located within a 10 minute walk from the main shopping centre, surrounded by schools, kindergartens, facilities and public transport right at your doorstep. Only a stone's throw away from the Princes Hwy for Geelong CBD commuters and a short 2 minutes' drive to the Geelong Ring Road bringing Melbourne CBD only a short 45 minute drive away plus some of Victoria's best beaches only a 30 minute drive and North Shore train station only 5 minutes' drive. Don't miss out!
Potential rent return of $260 per week. Currently tenanted until July 2018.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Quiet court location.
Tucked away in a quiet court of Corio, this well-kept 3BR brick residence is ideal for first home buyers, families or investors. Fully fenced on a generous 601sqm block with an extensive driveway, the home offers spacious, bright living areas with bold feature walls and an inviting ambience in every room. The kitchen is fully functional with practical cooking space including ample bench tops, stainless steel oven and gas cooking, and an adjoining dining area. The bedrooms are generous and comfortable all with BIRs, served by a large bathroom and laundry. The property has ample parking and is positioned in a great spot, particularly for Melbourne commuters with easy access to the Princes Highway. Local conveniences and public transport are also nearby. Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this affordable, comfortable home today!
Photo ID Required

Description:
Investor, First home Buyer or Downsizers Delight
This neat 3 bed, 2 bath 1 living property set on a 537m2 block is sure to impress. This freshly painted with new carpet home would suit FHB, Investors and downsizers. The kitchen offers lots of cupboard and bench space, dishwasher, s/s oven & gas cook top. The master bedroom has fantastic BIR and offers a brand new modern ensuite. Off the hall way you have a family bathroom with bath & vanity plus 2 other spacious bedrooms. Outside is a lovely paved pergola area with extended decking where you can sit and relax after a hard days work. Impressive inside and out, beautifully maintained all you need to do is move in and enjoy.
Close to local schools, shops and public transport, 15 minute drive to Geelong CBD.
• Central heating
• 537m2 block
• SLUG
• $300-$320 Rent per week

Description:
Family entertainer.
This immaculately presented home boasting multiple living zones, has been superbly renovated to accommodate for the growing family offering an easy and convenient lifestyle. A home of this calibre bursting with additional features is sure to tick a lot of boxes for all buyers alike. Beautifully kept by the current owners yet ready for a new family to move in and make it their own, the home incorporates a comfortable lounge upon entry that opens through to the extensive, light filled living area towards the rear which is overlooked by the practical kitchen nestled in the centre of the home. Three comfortable bedrooms and an additional study are located down the hall with close proximity to the central bathroom, separate laundry and an added powder room. A private bricked courtyard offers the perfect place to hang washing outside & allows access to the impressive separate bungalow complete with large ensuite & WIR, ideal for a teenagers retreat or master bedroom the versatility of the space possesses a wide range of uses to suit the new owner's needs. The charming property provides secure off street parking with a roller door in the driveway enabling access to a tandem carport. An additional single car garage sits at the end of the driveway that has been beautiful transformed into an excellent man cave complete with bar. The low maintenance rear yard still possesses ample space for the whole family to enjoy. Nestled in an established neighbourhood within
walking distance to Hendy Reserve the location of this impressive home provides easy access to the Geelong Ring Road and just a short commute to Corio Shopping Centre and most major amenities. You'll be hard pressed to find a better property on the market that possesses this much potential.
Insights: 138 Plantation Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Irresistible investment or first home
Situated on 612sqm of land in a quiet street, this well-kept north facing home is the ideal investment property or opportunity for a first home buyer to enter the market. With a floorplan that offers a spacious sun soaked lounge with split system heating and cooling, 3 generous bedrooms all with built in robes and ceiling fans, renovated kitchen with ample storage and updated two way bathroom. The large backyard offers plenty of space for the family to enjoy and an oversized double garage set behind secure gates. Located within walking distance to schools, parklands, transport and only moments to Corio Village and train station, this home is one not to miss!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
1061m2 allotment in the heart of Corio.
Very rarely do we see a corner allotment of this size come to market with a neat home that's currently tenant, let alone one with architectural sketches to potentially construct 5 townhouses (STCA). This magnificent 1061m2 approx parcel of land lends itself to future development ideal for builders and savvy investors with an eye for value and future profit. The home itself is well kept by the current tenant and comprises of 3 generous bedrooms all containing BIR's opposite the central bathroom. The comfortable living area features polished floorboards and flows through to the spacious & practical kitchen. An undercover alfresco at the rear is the perfect place to sit and relax with views of a beautiful established garden. Situated in a desirable location the property is close by to local schools, Shell Reserve, Geelong Ring Road and just a short commute to the Corio Shopping Centre.

Invest wisely.
Nestled away in the ever popular Cloverdale Estate in a quiet court location you won't find better value than this brick veneer home located on approx. 572m2 block of land. The property comprises of 3 comfortable bedrooms 2 with BIRs, a spacious lounge that opens up into the practical kitchen/meals area, and a neat central bathroom. Description:
Development Opportunity On Corner Allotment
A simple glance and the potential of this untouched weatherboard gem in the heart of Corio shouts opportunity! Perfectly positioned in a desirable street, is a large 586m2 (approx) corner block that the everyday buyer will see as a perfect first or second home with the opportunity to develop, renovate, extend or just enjoy, while the savvy investor will see the dual street frontage as profitable to subdivide and develop (STCA). Step inside and you are greeted with 3 comfortable bedrooms, light filled living and dining area, equipped kitchen facilities and central bathroom all neat and well appointed. Outside is a sun soaked low maintenance garden while boasting easy access to all of North Geelong's most convenient amenities and the ring road. With the limited amount of corner block sites available these days, this is an inspection priority for anyone wanting to capitalise.
Terms: 10% Deposit, 90 day Settlement. For alternative arrangements, please discuss with agent.

Perfectly located this charming four bedroom home is simply ideal for an investment property, first home buyer or anyone looking for a project to renovate and reap the rewards. Set on a generous allotment of 595m2 (approx.).
Offering three comfortable bedrooms on the ground floor all with BIR's, neat central bathroom with walk in shower, open plan kitchen/meals area and adjacent generous front living room. Continuing up the spiral stairs you'll find the master bedroom complete with large walk in robe.
All this plus a generously sized backyard, single lock up garage, solar panels and two garden sheds.
Walking distance to Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, local schools and public transport as well as easy access to Princes Hwy for Geelong commuters and just minutes to the Ring Road for Melbourne or Surf Coast commuters.
Currently tenanted until 5th May 2018 at $300 per week.

Description:
Solid investment or first home in growth corridor
Set in the fast growing Cloverdale Estate in Corio, the convenience of this location is fantastic. With corner store nearby, public transport, schools and Corio Village only minutes away.
The sound brick veneer home has been well maintained and offers open plan living, neat kitchen with breakfast bar and meals/dining area opening out to covered patio/deck area. 3 bedrooms with robes, family bathroom with shower and bath. It's original inside offering a blank canvas for those looking to put their touch on the home and enjoy future capital growth.
Set on 548m2 of land.
The single carport leads to single lock up garage with rear yard access. Ready to move into on 30-60 day settlement, call today for more information.

Description:
Solid first home or investment.
Searching for the perfect property with room to move? This 3 Bedroom property provides more than meets the eye, this home is sure to be well sort after by all! Neatly presented and situated on an impressive 661m2 allotment, this property is ideal for families, first home buyers or investors looking for a home with scope to add their own touches. This elaborate home boasts 3 generous bedrooms in total 2 with BIRs, comfortable lounge at the front with gas heater, stylishly renovated central bathroom with separate shower and spa bath, a well-proportioned kitchen and adjoining meals area. The backyard provides a 11x7.5m garage with 6 car capacity with side gate access to the property. This property is sure to appeal to all who need extra space for the caravan, boat or storage. The large yard provides an undercover area, great for entertaining and plenty of space for the kids to play. Located just minutes drive to Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, parks & reserves. Easy access to public transport with bus stops just around the corner, and the Princes Highway close by means of just a 10 minute drive to Geelong's waterfront and CBD. With such a terrific position and fantastic potential this home will not last. Be sure to inspect this before it's too late!
Insights: 44 Purnell Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
